cargoLinkInfo.title: What is Cargo Link?
cargoLinkInfo.description1: Cargo Link is a comprehensive shipping and logistics platform designed for businesses and individuals. It allows you to manage, track, and optimize the transportation of goods quickly, safely, and efficiently. Whether you need to make a local or national shipment, our technology simplifies the entire process in one place.
cargoLinkInfo.description2: With smart tools and personalized attention, we guarantee a hassle-free experience for both carriers and customers. Cargo Link is the ideal ally for your logistics operations!

features.title: Get started with our application...
features.clientDescription: As a client, you can request shipments, track your packages in real-time, choose from multiple carriers, and manage everything from a simple and fast interface.
features.transporterDescription: As a transporter, you can accept orders, optimize your routes, receive secure payments, and access management tools to enhance your logistics operation.

startPage.description: We are a company dedicated to logistics and freight transportation, offering efficient and secure solutions for your shipments. With our platform, you can manage your shipments easily and quickly, ensuring customer satisfaction.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how CargoLink collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our platform.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect several types of information from and about users of our platform, including:

items.personal: Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
items.usage: Usage data (how you interact with our platform)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including:

items.serviceProvision: To provide and maintain our Service
items.serviceImprovement: To improve and personalize your experience
items.communication: To communicate with you about updates, support, and promotional offerings

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
dataSharing.content: We may share your personal information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this Privacy Policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:

items.access: The right to access the personal information we have about you
items.rectification: The right to request that we correct any personal information you believe is inaccurate
items.deletion: The right to request that we delete your personal information
items.objection: The right to object to processing of your personal information

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

services.title: What is CargoLink?
services.description: CargoLink is a digital platform designed to facilitate and optimize the management of shipments between customers and carriers. Our goal is to provide a fast, reliable, and transparent experience for all parties involved in a logistics process. We have developed a functional system with key modules and continue to improve it to become a comprehensive solution for any business requiring freight transportation.

features.userManagement: User management: Registration and administration of accounts for both customers and carriers.
features.secureAuthentication: Secure authentication: Reliable login system and role-based access control.
features.bilateralReviews: Bilateral reviews: Evaluations between customers and carriers after each shipment.
features.adminPanel: Admin panel: Centralized access with statistics and overall control (statistics simulated for now).
features.transporterPanel: Carrier panel: Viewing assigned shipments and basic management tools.
features.availableShipments: Available shipments list: Real-time viewing based on their status.
features.detailedView: Detailed view of each shipment: Inquiry of origin, destination, and key data to confirm availability.
features.responsiveInterface: Responsive interface: Adapted for mobile, tablets, and desktop.
features.cloudinaryIntegration: Cloudinary connection: Optimized and fast image management.

additionalFeatures.profileSettings: Profile settings: Change password, name, phone, and option to delete the account.
additionalFeatures.userManagementPanel: User management panel: For administrators to easily create, edit, and delete users.
additionalFeatures.shipmentManagementPanel: Shipment management panel: Full control over all shipments on the platform.
additionalFeatures.myShipmentsPanel: My shipments panel: For both customers and carriers to view all their shipments (active, inactive, with filters).
additionalFeatures.customHomepage: Custom homepage: To show each user their statistics and recent activity after logging in.
additionalFeatures.transporterHomepage: Carrier homepage: With balance viewing, statistics, and active shipments.
additionalFeatures.mapIntegration: Map integration: To view current locations, origin, and destination of shipments.
additionalFeatures.informativePages: Informative pages: About roles, benefits, and how to make the most of the platform (customer/carrier).
additionalFeatures.smartRedirects: Smart redirects: To ensure each user accesses what corresponds to their role.
additionalFeatures.dynamicCharts: Dynamic charts: Clear and visual statistics on the panels.
additionalFeatures.visualProfilePanel: Visual profile panel: Where the user's name and email can be clearly seen.

services.commitment: At CargoLink, we work day by day to become the trusted platform for shipment management. Our focus is to provide a useful, easy-to-use technological solution ready to adapt to different business models.

transporterServices.title: Services for Carriers
transporterServices.description: At CargoLink, we provide carriers with all the tools they need to work efficiently, organized, and profitably. Connect with more customers, manage your routes, and grow your logistics operation from one place!

acceptOrders.title: Easily Accept Orders
acceptOrders.description: View available shipments and accept those that best fit your location, schedule, and capacity.

optimizeRoutes.title: Optimize Your Routes
optimizeRoutes.description: Use interactive maps to plan your trips and deliver more in less time.

securePayments.title: Receive Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Receive your payments quickly and securely through our integrated platform.

consultStatistics.title: Consult Statistics
consultStatistics.description: Check your income, number of deliveries, performance, and more from your control panel.

realTimeLocation.title: Real-Time Location
realTimeLocation.description: Track your current route and view the origin and destination of packages on the map.

receiveRatings.title: Receive Ratings
receiveRatings.description: Build your reputation with each delivery. Customers can leave you reviews that will help you get more orders.

totalFlexibility.title: Total Flexibility
totalFlexibility.description: You decide when to work and which shipments to accept. Manage your time independently.

profileManagement.title: Profile Management
profileManagement.description: Set up your profile, check your data, and prepare for future tools like account editing and deletion.

transporterServices.maximizingProductivity: Maximize your productivity and earn more income with CargoLink, the platform designed for transportation professionals. Start today!

userServices.title: Services for Clients
userServices.description: At CargoLink, we provide you with all the tools you need to manage your shipments quickly, securely, and hassle-free. Our platform is designed for you to have complete control over your deliveries from one place.

requestShipments.title: Request Shipments in Seconds
requestShipments.description: Complete an easy and intuitive form to generate your shipment request in just a few steps.

trackPackages.title: Track Your Packages
trackPackages.description: View the status and location of your shipments in real-time from your personal dashboard.

chooseCarrier.title: Choose Your Carrier
chooseCarrier.description: Compare available carriers and select the one that best fits your needs.

rateExperience.title: Rate Your Experience
rateExperience.description: Leave a review about the carrier and improve the quality of service for the entire community.

manageProfile.title: Manage Your Profile
manageProfile.description: You can edit your personal information, change your password, and soon manage everything from your settings.

shipmentHistory.title: Shipment History
shipmentHistory.description: Check all the shipments you have made, filtering by status, date, or carrier.

smartLocations.title: Smart Locations
smartLocations.description: View the origin and destination of your shipments on the map, along with your current location.

personalizedSupport.title: Personalized Support
personalizedSupport.description: Receive support and follow-up from your account if any questions or issues arise.

userServices.maximizingProductivity: All of this from a platform that is easy to use, secure, and tailored to your daily needs. Start today with CargoLink!
